Description: On I-64 at mile marker 192 in the City of Richmond, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The east exit 192 narrows.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 168.5 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect potential delays due to a vehicle crash. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On US-50 in the County of Fauquier, in the vicinity of Greengarden Rd; Horsefields Ln; Oakley Ln; Willisville Rd; Rt. 623N/S (Loudoun County), motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. All east lanes are closed. All west lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash
